title: TANZANIA AIR QUALITY TIME SERIES PREDICTION PROJECT
description:
Embarking on a journey through Tanzania’s air reveals more than just data points; it unveils a narrative of environmental rhythms. In the pulsating heartbeats of time series, we unravel the nuanced tale of air quality, bridging the gap between data and the breath of a nation.

Join me in exploring the unseen symphony of Tanzania’s air, where each spike and dip echoes a story of environmental impact and resilience

title: CARS SPARE PARTS SALES ANALYSIS
description: A groundbreaking Power BI car sales dashboard that's not just visually stunning but loaded with insights for aspiring data analysts. Explore key data metrics, from total sales to profit growth, and discover intriguing patterns in sales segments, booking types, car colors, and regional trends.

title: CAR INSURANCE ANALYSIS
description: An exploratory analysis into the car insurance system, the profits and losses, causes, and future recommendations

description: Transformation of raw housing data in SQL Server to make it more useable for data analysis is what is done in this project.
